channel.title: c++ on C & C++ FAQ
channel.description: Recent content in c++ on C & C++ FAQ

item.title: How do I enable compiler warnings?
item.description: For gcc and clang users Add -Wall -Wextra to your compilation flags. (Note that, contrary to what the name -Wall may imply, this does not enable all warnings, but it does enable most of the important ones.) For Visual Studio users Unlike gcc and clang, Visual Studio does enable some warnings by default. To set the warning level to something different, Consult Microsoft’s documentation here.
